description: The Equals Tier List has been updated by HanooSt.
Deck suggestions show card levels from your collection and are ordered accordingly.
Opening official cards in the card builder with a loaded collection display the upgrade progres bar like in game.
When filtering collection by excess copies, cards will be ordered by most locked coins to least.
It is now possible to find the odds of pulling fuston stones and coins from books.
The card collection now offers handy stats and data visualisation about your cards.
It is now possible to find the odds of pulling a certain card from a book with the books calculator.
It is now possible to sort the card collection by card value.
The collection now informs how much coins would the excess copies bring after the Brawl update.
The Elders and the Brawl update balance changes are here!
The deck suggestions no longer have tags, but a new filter by author feature is available.
The Stories section has been divided in sub-sections per categories.
The site‚Äôs code is now available on GitHub (under GPL-3.0).
There now is a deck tracker to get accurate drawing chances during an actual game.
The deck builder now providers a (smart) random deck generator.
It is now possible to create tier lists of cards with the new tier list builder!
Discover the new feline card exclusively on Stormbound Kitty! üê±
Many thanks to MooreFunn for authoring a guide to play pirates!
The winner of the weekly card contest will receive a random epic card in game!
All 5 new feline cards have been added to the site.
The Card Contest page now displays the Hall of Fame of previous winning cards.
Stories are now first-class citizens and replace the quest builder in the top navigation.
All changes from the May update are now published: new cards, existing cards‚Äô update, new upgrade costs, new copies requirements.
The CSV file should now look decent when opened in a third-party software such as Excel.
Some existing cards now display community-authored stories in the card builder.
The filters for the collection view are now more suited for it (faction, status and level).
The 5 new cards from the upcoming update are now available.
The complete Stormbound guide by Arikrat is now available on the site!
Decks can now be exported as images to be shared more easily.
It is now possible to import and export cards collections.
Cards can now be selected with keys 1 to 4, played with ‚ÄúP‚Äù, cycled with ‚ÄúC‚Äù and the turn can be ended with ‚ÄúE‚Äù.
The card builder now has a display mode to hide the editing interface.
The desktop version of the simulator will now load a random background.
The site‚Äôs footer has been redesigned to provide more information and offer a way to make a small donation.
It is now possible to dry-run equal decks by clicking ‚ÄúReset game‚Äù and checking ‚ÄúReset in equal levels‚Äù.
Updating the level of a card in the deck can be done by re-adding the card with a different level.
The footer now includes a link to the outstanding Stormbound Guide from Arikrat.
Collector Mirz now spawns tokens of all races, and their chances of draw work as intended.
It is now possible to filter decks based on whether they include a certain card.
